content:
As discussed on the 2022-03-14 Pharmacy Workgroup call we are proposing the following Block-Vote-2 as a part of STU2 ballot reconciliation for the Da Vinci Formulary IG to be voted on at next weekâ€™s Pharmacy WG meeting (Monday, 2022-03-21).

You may request to remove any item from the block vote by responding to the email posted to the Pharmacy list, posting on this Formulary Zulip Stream, or during the call before the vote with the specific Key for the item you wish to have removed.

Jira search string: project = "FHIR Specification Feedback" AND Specification = "US Da Vinci Drug Formulary (FHIR) [FHIR-us-davinci-df]" AND Grouping = Block-Vote-2

Issue key Summary Disposition Reporter
FHIR-34526 IG needs a definition of "must-support" Persuasive Cooper Thompson
FHIR-34527 Remove most must-support flags on profiles Persuasive with Mod Cooper Thompson
FHIR-32618 mustSupport elements aren't complete Persuasive Lloyd McKenzie
FHIR-35587 Defining URL should be anchored in THO not hl7.org - InsuranceItemTypeVS Not Persuasive Joan Harper
